patthana16.39:4.1: Micchattaniyataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.39:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.39:5.1: Micchattaniyataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.39:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
